steps.title: Thank you for participating in the mPower study.
steps.text: We heard your requests and updated the study. We added new features, new surveys and new activities.
steps.detailText: The next screens describe the study. Please review the study information and re-affirm that you want to participate.

items.title: Comprehension
items.text: Let's do a quick and simple test of your understanding of this study.

items.title: What is the purpose of this study?

items.text: Understand the fluctuations of Parkinson disease symptoms

items.title: My name will be stored with my study data.
I can take back my data after it is used in other research.
Some survey questions may be slightly stressful for some people.
I can pause/resume participating at any time

steps.title: Try Again
steps.text: You answered one or more questions wrong. We want to make sure you understand what this study is about and what is involved. Review the information screens and try again.

steps.title: Great Job!
steps.text: You answered all of the questions correctly.

steps.title: Thank You!
steps.text: Your participation in this study is helping us to better understand the symptoms of Parkinson Disease.

sections.sectionSummary: This overview explains the research study. After you learn about the study, you can choose if you would like to participate.
It is important to know what this study is about and what is involved. Before you can join, we will ask you to take a short quiz to test your understanding.
To understand changes in your health, we will ask you to complete surveys and simple activities daily and weekly. We will look for patterns over time.

The sensors on your phone will collect data when you use the app. Some people wear fitness trackers. We will ask your permission to add the data from the sensors on your fitness tracker to the study. You do not have to agree.
You can view your data at any time. When you look at your data you may notice patterns. Seeing health patterns can generate a wide range of emotions.

We will protect your privacy to the best of our ability. Your data will be encrypted on your phone. We will replace your name with a random code and store your coded study data on a secure cloud server.  But we cannot promise total privacy.
Your coded study data will be used for research. It will be combined with data from other volunteers. It will be transferred to an analysis platform in the United States.

This study will take about 20 minutes per day. Monthly reviews may take an additional 5 minutes once a month.

The time you spend on the app may count against your mobile data plan. You can set up the app to use Wi-Fi connections instead.
Surveys are an important part of this research study. We will ask you to complete weekly and monthly surveys about your health.
Your participation in this study could help researchers understand PD better. You may or may not benefit from this research study.
If you participate in this study, your privacy may be at risk. There may be other risks to participating that we do not know about yet.
